thread.title: Moldova fined over fans misconduct during Euro qualifiers
thread.title_full: Moldova fined over fans misconduct during Euro qualifiers

author: NewsWire
title: Moldova fined over fans misconduct during Euro qualifiers
text: 0 0 0 0 0 Madrid, Oct 24 (IANS) European football governing body UEFA has fined Moldova 15,000 euros ($16,566) and ordered the partial closure of its stadium due to the behaviour of its fans during its Euro 2016 qualifying tie against Russia . The Control, Ethics and Disciplinary Body (CEDB) of the UEFA on Friday announced in a statement that the penalty was imposed due to “crowd disturbances”, “racist flags” and “setting off fireworks” during the European qualifiers match held on October 9, Efe reported. Moldova lost 1-2 against Russia . Related Posts
